sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LOAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , ACC_NO , LEND_KD , HOUSE_TAKE_DT , MORT_SETUP_DT , START_DT , END_DT , REPAY_YEARS , LEND_GOODS_NM , DEBT , FIXED_RATE_DEBT , NOT_DEFER_DEBT , THIS_YEAR_REDE_AMT , SUM_DDCT , YEAR_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_J203Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND DAT_CD = 'G0017' AND PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , LOAN_SEIL_NUM ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_J203Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LOAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , ACC_NO , LEND_KD , HOUSE_TAKE_DT , MORT_SETUP_DT , START_DT , END_DT , REPAY_YEARS , LEND_GOODS_NM , DEBT , FIXED_RATE_DEBT , NOT_DEFER_DEBT , THIS_YEAR_REDE_AMT , SUM_DDCT , YEAR_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM PDF_J203Y) , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #datCd# , #busnid# , #tradeNm# , #accNo# , #lendKd# , #houseTakeDt# , #mortSetupDt# , #startDt# , #endDt# , #repayYears# , #lendGoodsNm# , #debt# , #fixedRateDebt# , #notDeferDebt# , #thisYearRedeAmt# , #sumDdct# , #yearSumDdct# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_J203Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , LOAN_SEIL_NUM=#loanSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , ACC_NO=#accNo# , LEND_KD=#lendKd# , HOUSE_TAKE_DT=#houseTakeDt# , MORT_SETUP_DT=#mortSetupDt# , START_DT=#startDt# , END_DT=#endDt# , REPAY_YEARS=#repayYears# , LEND_GOODS_NM=#lendGoodsNm# , DEBT=#debt# , FIXED_RATE_DEBT=#fixedRateDebt# , NOT_DEFER_DEBT=#notDeferDebt# , THIS_YEAR_REDE_AMT=#thisYearRedeAmt# , SUM_DDCT=#sumDdct# , YEAR_SUM_DDCT=#yearSumDdct# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LOAN_SEIL_NUM=#loanSeilNum#

UPDATE PDF_J203Y SET PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'),0,8) , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LOAN_SEIL_NUM=#loanSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_J203Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LOAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , ACC_NO , LEND_KD , HOUSE_TAKE_DT , MORT_SETUP_DT , START_DT , END_DT , REPAY_YEARS , LEND_GOODS_NM , DEBT , FIXED_RATE_DEBT , NOT_DEFER_DEBT , THIS_YEAR_REDE_AMT , SUM_DDCT , YEAR_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_J203Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LOAN_SEIL_NUM=#loanSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LOAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , ACC_NO , LEND_KD , HOUSE_TAKE_DT , MORT_SETUP_DT , START_DT , END_DT , REPAY_YEARS , LEND_GOODS_NM , DEBT , FIXED_RATE_DEBT , NOT_DEFER_DEBT , THIS_YEAR_REDE_AMT , SUM_DDCT , YEAR_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_J203Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , LOAN_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_J203Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
